text: @SethAbramson @VickyisGrateful I'm in UK live in nth West daughter went to I huge Xmas do Ln London 21st Dec there for 4 days, 2nd Jan started coughing tired aching & her breathing bad tested fur asthma neg told she had a virus,  think covid19 in UK in 2019
